comments:
Breakpoint at line 100 in PlantyEditor
Open an Ant Editor in the target to hit the breakpoint
In the variables view add a watch for "this"
In the expressions view, expand the hierarchy for this
Resume the program
Select one of the member variables of this
Context menu>Watch
